OrgName.entry: WHITE HOUSE PHYSIOTHERAPY AND SPORTS INJURIES

Desc.entry: Member of Chartered Society of Physiotherapy, State Registered Physiotherapist, Graduate Diploma Physiotherapy and Membership Examinations of the Society of Orthopaedic Medicine. Has a special interest in back injuries. Manipulative treatment, sports injuries, health screening, fitness and exercise testing, biomechanical analysis. Recognised by all leading health insurance companies. The clinic has a sports rehabilitation gymnasium. Medical doctor in attendance. Established 25 years. Costs approx £40 for a new assessment and £35 for follow up treatment for physiotherapy. Please contact for up-to-date details of prices.

Address.entry: White House Physiotherapy and Sports Injuries Clinic
